desc:
The model you've been waiting for this winter is here. Materia Boot celebrates its fifth anniversary in a very retro way as it features the first classic Muroexe logo. A vintage touch but with the same technical and sporty features that made you fall in love with them.

It has a super minimalist design and a resistant sole with 2 non-slip pieces. All this without forgetting the most important thing, your feet will be dry at the end of the day no matter where you've been thanks to the fully waterproof surface.

And the logo is not the only vintage thing about it, because for this special occasion, we have brought the production back to home so it is 100% made in Spain.
